name: SHAccountManager
summary: SHAccountManager is currently unmaintained and abanonded, please use 'pod SHOmniAuthTwitter' instead.
description:
SHAccountManager is currently unmaintained and abanonded, please use 'pod SHOmniAuthTwitter' instead.
